name: Prophecy of Submersion
title: Mona: Prophecy of Submersion
desc: "Hey! You should be playing that card!"\n"...Well, alright then, do what you want."
in_play_description: When your Mona, who has this card equipped, is the active character, the Hydro-Related Reactions you trigger deal +2 additional DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Mona to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Mona, equip this card.
When Mona equips this card, immediately use Stellaris Phantasm once.
When your Mona, who has this card equipped, is the active character, the Hydro-Related Reactions you trigger deal +2 additional DMG.
(You must have Mona in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
